short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Repurpose webpages to blog, social posts, summaries, newsletter or any other format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Narrato's 'Repurpose Webpage' Chrome extensions lets users pick the content from the existing webpage and repurpose it to any format using AI, like a summary, social post, blog post, or any other content format of your choice.
